list.content: In this most enigmatic & treasured recipe of Behrouz, immaculately spiced fresh,
list.morecontent: In this most enigmatic & treasured recipe of Behrouz, immaculately spiced fresh, succulent mutton pieces are layered with basmati & then slow-cooked on a charcoal fire.
